title: Haitian-Canadian author Myriam J.A. Chancy makes a reading list for Haiti
description: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly talks with Haitian-Canadian author Myriam J.A. Chancy about what's happening in Haiti and a list of books to help make sense of precipitating events.
content:encoded: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly talks with Haitian-Canadian author Myriam J.A. Chancy about what's happening in Haiti and a list of books to help make sense of precipitating events.
dc:creator: Jason Fuller
